deprecated.displayName: Orbit has been shutdown and will no longer function from July 11th, You can read more here.
deprecated.name: deprecated

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: memberId
options.description: When set the post will be filtered by the member ID

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

resolveIdentities.name: resolveIdentities
resolveIdentities.description: By default, the response just includes the reference of the identity. When set to true the identities will be resolved automatically.

options.name: options
sort
options.description: Name of the field the response will be sorted by

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

source.name: source
source.description: Set to github, twitter, email, discourse or the source of any identities you've manually created
source.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

searchBy.name: searchBy
searchBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

updateFields.name: updateFields

options.name: tagsToAdd
options.description: Adds tags to member; comma-separated string or array

options.name: tagList
options.description: Replaces all tags for the member; comma-separated string or array

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

identityUi.name: identityUi
identityUi.description: The identity is used to find the member. If no member exists, a new member will be created and linked to the provided identity.

values.name: source
values.description: Set to github, twitter, email, discourse or the source of any identities you've manually created

identityUi.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

url.name: url
url.description: Supply any URL and Orbit will do its best job to parse out a title, description, and image
url.ai_hint: 必须包含协议头 (http:// 或 https://)。支持表达式注入。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'title'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'activity' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'activity' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'activity' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveIdentities'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'member' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'member' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveIdentities'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' THEN SHOW parameter 'source'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' AND source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'searchBy'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' AND searchBy == 'id' AND source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' AND searchBy == 'username' AND source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'username'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' AND source == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'lookup' AND source == 'discourse' THEN SHOW parameter 'host'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'identityUi'
IF source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'searchBy'
IF searchBy == 'id' AND source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'id'
IF searchBy == 'username' AND source IN ["discourse", "github", "twitter"] THEN SHOW parameter 'username'
IF source == 'email' THEN SHOW parameter 'email'
IF source == 'discourse' THEN SHOW parameter 'host'
IF resource == 'member' AND operation == 'upsert' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'note'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'note' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'note' THEN SHOW parameter 'resolveMember'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'noteId'
IF resource == 'note' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'note'
IF resource == 'post' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'url'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'post' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'post' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'post' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'memberId'
IF operation == 'delete' AND resource == 'post' THEN SHOW parameter 'postId'
